main.name: Siddharth Arya
main.description: I eat, sleep, breathe, and talk about code all day long.
main.bio: I'm a web developer. I spend my whole day, practically every day, experimenting with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and node; dabbling with Python; and inhaling a wide variety of potentially useless information through my YouTube, LinkedIn and Twitter feeds. I build websites that delight and inform. I'm curious, and I enjoy work that challenges me to learn something new and stretch in a different direction. I do my best to stay on top of changes in the state of the art so that I can meet challenges with tools well suited to the job at hand. The list of projects I follow on GitHub will give you a good idea of the types of tools I'd prefer to be using, and my “Starred” list will give you a glimpse into the reading material I find interesting enough to share.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me, with any of the methods mentioned in this site

address.street: Rameshwaram Apartments, Omaxe City, Ajmer Road

education.description: Doing a specialisation in Data science and Artificial Intelligence

work.title: Research and Development Intern
work.description: Researched about Land laws of India and developed a web application to show all those laws in a geographical interface map of India.

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
